channel.title: Help please
channel.description: ok so my compiler for hybrid pvp is broken and it says it has compiled but it clearly hasnt can anyone give me a working compiler code or a download to a working compiler? help would be much appreciated thanks guys :)

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

i got hybrid pvp and he compielr is fine. mae sure you SAVE teh stuff ur workign on, then compile. u cant have any files open when u compile, and ur server has to be shut down completly.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

I’m guessing it’s the source comiler, since this is Server Help. Here is my code:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

If you’re having trouble with your Client Compiler(If so, this should be posted in Client Help), then you should use this code:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
